author: wn.com
title: Campfire Ban Partially Lifted at Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area (NPS - National Park Service) ...
text: ( Source : NPS - National Park Service ) Date : October 1, 2015 Contact : Denise Bausch, 509-754-7886 Effective immediately, campfires are allowed in established fire rings in campgrounds and day-use areas throughout Lake Roosevelt National
